Package ES_2Sem_2021_Grupo_23.CodeQualityAssessor.Rules

Class Rules_Storage

java.lang.Object
ES_2Sem_2021_Grupo_23.CodeQualityAssessor.Rules.Rules_Storage
public class Rules_Storage
extends java.lang.Object
Rules_Storage is an object with the purpose of keeping and manipulating the rules

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Rules_Storage()
    Try to load the rules binary object stored in rules.dat file if can't load create a new Rule_Storage

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addRule​(java.lang.String ruleName, java.lang.String rule)

    Change a rule that already exists

    Change a rule name that already exists

    Receives a rule name and return the corresponding rule

  • Constructor Details

    • Rules_Storage

      public Rules_Storage()
      Try to load the rules binary object stored in rules.dat file if can't load create a new Rule_Storage

  • Method Details

    • getRulesNames

      public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getRulesNames()
      Give all rule names
      Returns:
      all the names of the existing rules in the Rule_Storage

    • getRule

      public java.lang.String getRule​(java.lang.String ruleName)
      Receives a rule name and return the corresponding rule
      Parameters:
      ruleName - to search the rule in the Rule_Storage
      Returns:
      the respective rule

    • removeRule

      public void removeRule​(java.lang.String ruleName)
      Receives a rule name and removes it from the database
      Parameters:
      ruleName - to search the rule in the Rule_Storage

    • addRule

      public boolean addRule​(java.lang.String ruleName, java.lang.String rule)
      Add a new rule to the Rule_Storage if it doesn't already exists
      Parameters:
      ruleName - to check if the rule already exists and if not to use as hashmap key
      rule - content of the rule
      Returns:
      if the rule already exits return false, else return true

    • changeRuleName

      public void changeRuleName​(java.lang.String oldRuleName, java.lang.String newRuleName)
      Change a rule name that already exists
      Parameters:
      oldRuleName - to get the rule to change
      newRuleName - to add as the new name for the rule

    • changeRule

      public void changeRule​(java.lang.String ruleName, java.lang.String newRule)
      Change a rule that already exists
      Parameters:
      ruleName - to get the rule
      newRule - to update as the new rule

    • saveCurrentDatabase

      public void saveCurrentDatabase() throws java.lang.Exception
      Save the current database
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - Throws a Exception when can not save the File

    • loadDatabase

      public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> loadDatabase() throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException, java.io.IOException
      Load Database
      Returns:
      return the saved HashMap
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws a IOException when can not read the File
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Throws a ClassNotFoundException when the binary object in the file do not match the expected HashMap
